name: 尼拉夫·普拉贾帕蒂
name_full: 尼拉夫·普拉贾帕蒂 Nirav Prajapati
introduction: He was born and raised in Gujarat, India, and always felt like he was constantly looking for more ways to creatively express himself. He is a man who wears many hats like a son, a brother, a theatre performer, and a folk dancer, but still it didn't feel like that was enough.So he finally started his journey as an “Actor”.He decided to move out of his country in order to further pursue his dreams and began his studies in Acting at the “Academy of Performing Arts in Prague”, Czech Republic. Thankfully, this led him to more opportunities to really dive into this industry. Here, he was able to get many roles in theatre performances, short films, commercials, feature films, and even TV series. He hopes to continue working on more projects such as these in the industry.
